Reviews.Title: Christmas Gift
Reviews.Author: Juan H Matias
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased the Canon Rebel T4i bundle as a Christmas gift for my wife. We had been talking about a camera and she had mentioned the Rebel a few times. She was very surprised when it arrived and has used it in family gatherings and especially for taking pictures of our infant son. She loves it, she is very happy with her gift and I am happy that she is happy.

Reviews.Title: Nice kit
Reviews.Author: A. Apolinario
Reviews.Content: the set corresponded totally to description.The packaging was great, safe and ... big!!!very entusiastic to try all the items.

Reviews.Title: Love my Rebel T4i
Reviews.Author: akjrcl2
Reviews.Content: A great buy.  I love my camera.  I use it all the time.  Canon is the best quality camera.  Great seller and fast shipping.  Thank you.  Would buy again.  A+++

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Predatormaster
Reviews.Content: Fast to ship and great deal. I would recommend this package to anyone looking for a camera. I would do business here again.

Reviews.Title: great purchase
Reviews.Author: Flofbi
Reviews.Content: This camera is just perfect. great picture quality. it's gonna take me some times to get used with all the features.

Reviews.Title: Great camera bundle
Reviews.Author: Motochan
Reviews.Content: Bought it for my daughter and she loves it. Lot's of useful extras in the bundle, UV filters extra battery. the only thing that was weak was the camera bag. Seems a shame to put such a nice camera in such a crappy bag.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!!! Takes awesome pictures
Reviews.Author: wojtassec
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera. The pictures are evenly bright and awesomely clear. We haven't gotten to every option this camera has in it, but so far it is GREAT!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: Jose A Martinez
Reviews.Content: Great price for the bundle although I would had prefered it to include a 18-135mm or a 18-200mm lens.  Still it is a great product.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: jack42
Reviews.Content: great camera!  the camera takes wonderful high detail photos. I highly recommend it to anyone looking to take professional quality photos.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: G. Ruppert "mom of 2 angels"
Reviews.Content: Had everything.  Came with everything my wife could ever want.  The battery life is amazing and the pictures are great.  Easy to use and operate.

Reviews.Title: Canon Rebel T4I
Reviews.Author: Ray
Reviews.Content: It is all you need to get start with a SLR camera. Get features on the camera and the accessories  are all you need for starting with a SLR camera.

Reviews.Title: Canon T4i
Reviews.Author: Paul D. Smith
Reviews.Content: I do not have a single regret buying the T4i.  It is all I imagined and then some.  I plan on traveling and now have the camera and len's to capture the images I hope to put in a book.  Thank you!Paul Smith

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Sayed Nasser
Reviews.Content: I bought that camera after doing my own researches about it so finally I found it to be the best choice for methe camera is just fine even thou the sent me the second lenses after a long time because they said it was broken and they had to replace it

Reviews.Title: Very fast shipment .
Reviews.Author: Buntong Heap
Reviews.Content: Quick shipment even those I have to wait for back order of my lens. I like the camera very much. Now I gotta learn how to use it.LOL...... Thanks Guy!!
